event_data: This variable is global in scope and is used to hold a DS Map when used in the Gesture Events, and -1 at all other times. The actual contents of the DS map will depend on the type of gesture event that triggered it, so refer to the individual sections for those events.

{ANY_CODE} isFlick = event_data[?"isflick"];
if (isFlick)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}flickVelX = event_data[?"diffX"];
{nbsp_x4}flickVelY = event_data[?"diffY"];
{nbsp_x4}}
else
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}flickVelX = 0;
{nbsp_x4}flickVelY = 0;
{nbsp_x4}}

The above code is taken from the Drag End gesture event and checks to see if the vent is a "flick" event, and if it is it extracts the required data from the event_data DS map and uses it to set some variables. If a "flick" event is not detected, then the same variables are set to 0.
